name: Impermanent Frost
description:
Synopsis

Get the eggs back home to cook and avoid the angry ice worms!

Made in 2 days for Paint Jam 2018!

Controls - Keyboard

WSDA - Move Player

Arrow Keys - Rotate Pick/Egg

E - Break Ice/Pick-Up Egg

Space - Jump

Controls - Controller

Left Stick - Move Player

Right Stick - Rotate Pick/Egg

X - Break Ice/Pick-Up Egg

A - Jump

By Marty Daniels, Michael Guattery, Rachel Theil, JohnLee Cooper
